description:
This stealthy freeride shoe combines big mountain performance with urban style. Ride Concepts worked with the experts at Rubber Kinetics to create a proprietary outsole compound that provides excellent grip on flat pedals without sacrificing durability. Custom-moulded toe and heel guards and a reinforced insole protect your feet from big hits. The stylish suede-like upper is made from durable synthetic with anti-abrasion mesh.

  • Durable synthetic upper with anti-abrasion mesh
  • Fully gusseted tongue keeps debris out
  • Moulded toe and heel guard
  • D30 insole adds additional protection in high impact zones underfoot
  • EVA midsole provides support and shock absorption
  • Outsole compound strikes a balance between grip and durability
  • Hexagonal tread pattern enhances grip on flat pedals
name: Ride Concepts Livewire Cycling Shoes - Men's
